== Meetings ==

We come together to discuss what is going on in the team and what things people are interested in doing.  Join the meetings to help plan events.

== Schedule of Meetings ==
The current Team Meeting calendar is <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-michigan/meetings/|here]]</nowiki>

Our upcoming in-person events are available <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-michigan/events/|here]]</nowiki>
